member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.CoreMessaging.Services.SubscriptionsController.GetSubscriptions(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Perform a search on Scoring Activities registered in the system.
member.param: Number of records to return per page
The sort expression in the form [Description|SubscriptionType] [Asc|Desc]
member.returns: The sorted and paged list of subscriptions

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.CoreMessaging.Subscriptions.GetViewSettings
member.summary: These values are passed in as the 'settings' parameter of the JavaScript initialization function, together with values that are automatically retrieved by Social Library such as portalId and moduleId.
